attributes.action: Improve UK crime prevention,via a legally protected, crime help-line for potential criminals (and their concerned family and fiends, etc.).
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the UK Government:  To take all necessary steps, to ensure that: Anyone taking part in any such Government authorised, Crime Advice service; will be legally protected against any criminal or civil prosecution, for refusing to disclose any details; about the caller or the crime, to any outside body, including the police or any past or intended victims of the crime.
